name: Polydrome
description:
Story:

You act as a brave polygon, trying to protect your edges from being robbed by the zombie polygons - zolygons.

Gameplay:

  • Move and shoot and survive finite waves of attack.
  • Getting hurt means losing an edge. If you have fewer than 3 edges, then you die because you cannot you are not a polygon anymore.
  • Killing zolygons can earn you scores.
  • You can use scores to purchase upgrades from the base (right now only health recovery). The base can be destroyed by zolygons, but losing the base does not mean losing the game.

Control:

  • WASD to move. Mouse to aim. Hold left button to fire. 1-7 to switch between weapons.
  • For laser, hold left button to charge until it shoots.
  • When you are near the base, a shopping menu will pop up. You can press the corresponding button indicated on the item panel to purchase the item.

Enemies:

  • Zolygon: the basic enemy
  • Speedy zolygon: the faster version of Zolygon, also has a darker color
  • Creeper-gon: rushes to the player and explode within a certain distance, also explodes on death
